ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound skinless salmon fillet, cut into 2-inch chunks
2 tablespoons I Can't Believe It's Not Butter!® Spread, divided
10 ounces thin green beans, cut into 2-inch pieces
1 (5.4 ounce) package Knorr® Rice Sides™ - Herb & Butter

cookingTips: Cook rice according to package directions while you prepare salmon and green beans
Sauté garlic briefly before adding salmon to infuse oil with flavor without burning
Add green beans toward the end of cooking so they remain crisp and bright
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a quick weeknight meal. Would you like tips on coordinating components so everything finishes at the same time?
